channel.title: Vengeance! Help pleas 317
channel.description: Well in my rsps when i click on vengeance spell it makes the emote only (skull) but it doesnt even work when someone hits me. And also the spell vengeance other doesn't work at all Can someone help me fixing those problems??!! Thanks

item.title: Vengeance! Help pleas 317
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You’ll need to handle it, perhaps when used set the player’s vengeance timer to 30 seconds (or however long it lasts) then each time he gets hit check the timer, if above 0 repel some damage (or whatever vengeance does). As for the latter I would recommend using an old source to model from.

Read full topic

item.title: Vengeance! Help pleas 317

item.description:
@elias_haddad wrote:

Well in my rsps when i click on vengeance spell it makes the emote only (skull) but it doesnt even work when someone hits me.
And also the spell vengeance other doesn’t work at all
Can someone help me fixing those problems??!!
Thanks
